She told me to check back in a few days to see if I could download the policy, which meant the transaction had been completed. I goofed!  I did not make the call. title: I Needed a Fiduciary Bond
content: I needed a Fiduciary Bond for Cuyahoga County Probate Court. After researching various companies online and reading their reviews, I chose Brunswick because of the great reviews. One name kept coming up in the reviews as someone who really worked hard for you. I thought, maybe I would be able to have that same person who would walk me through the procedure on how to secure the bond. Was I surprised and pleased that Tina, the name that kept coming up in the reviews, was the person who helped me navigate the bond process. Tina was so helpful and courteous, but most of all, she listened. Finding people who really listen now-a-days, is very hard to come by. Tina was fantastic and if I could give her more than 5 stars, I would! Thank you again Tina, for all that you did, to secure the Fiduciary Bond for me. I would not hesitate to recommend Brunswick Companies, and Tina, for your bonding needs.
